recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: (Updated version  you can substitute capella sugar cookie for another bakery of your choice I mixed a version with FA cookie and it was delicious and Flavorah cookie is another option the bakery gives the custard some body experiment with different flavors is the beauty of DIY)A mix of light bourbon cream brown sugar and mild tobacco flavors in vanilla custard..
